results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.plot: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.
results.stars: Frank Darabont, Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
results.stars: Quentin Tarantino, John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis

results.title: Titanic
results.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
results.stars: James Cameron, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates

results.title: The Matrix
results.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
results.stars: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski, Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving

results.title: Goodfellas
results.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
results.stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco

results.title: Fight Club
results.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
results.stars: David Fincher, Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier

results.title: Good Will Hunting
results.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
results.stars: Gus Van Sant, Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård

results.title: Jurassic Park
results.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough

results.title: Tombstone
results.plot: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.
results.stars: George P. Cosmatos, Kevin Jarre, Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Sam Elliott, Bill Paxton

results.title: Heat
results.plot: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
results.stars: Michael Mann, Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer, Jon Voight

results.title: Schindler's List
results.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall

results.title: Se7en
results.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
results.stars: David Fincher, Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker

results.title: The Silence of the Lambs
results.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
results.stars: Jonathan Demme, Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
results.stars: Robert Zemeckis, Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field

results.title: American Beauty
results.plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
results.stars: Sam Mendes, Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley

results.title: Léon: The Professional
results.plot: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
results.stars: Luc Besson, Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello

results.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
results.plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her 10-year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.
results.stars: James Cameron, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick

results.title: Office Space
results.plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.
results.stars: Mike Judge, Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston, David Herman, Ajay Naidu

results.title: The Green Mile
results.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
results.stars: Frank Darabont, Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt

results.title: The Big Lebowski
results.plot: Ultimate L.A. slacker Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for a rug ruined by debt collectors, enlisting his bowling buddies for help while trying to find the millionaire's missing wife.
results.stars: Joel Coen, Ethan Coen, Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi

results.title: The Lion King
results.plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
results.stars: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff, Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg

results.title: Dances with Wolves
results.plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Native Americans, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.
results.stars: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene, Rodney A. Grant

results.title: My Cousin Vinny
results.plot: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.
results.stars: Jonathan Lynn, Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei, Ralph Macchio, Mitchell Whitfield

results.title: Saving Private Ryan
results.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns

results.title: The Truman Show
results.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.
results.stars: Peter Weir, Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich

results.title: Braveheart
results.plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
results.stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen

results.title: Casino
results.plot: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.
results.stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci, James Woods

results.title: The Fifth Element
results.plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.
results.stars: Luc Besson, Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, Gary Oldman, Ian Holm

results.title: Reservoir Dogs
results.plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
results.stars: Quentin Tarantino, Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn

results.title: The Sixth Sense
results.plot: A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
results.stars: M. Night Shyamalan, Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette, Olivia Williams

results.title: Boogie Nights
results.plot: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.
results.stars: Paul Thomas Anderson, Mark Wahlberg, Julianne Moore, Burt Reynolds, Luis Guzmán

results.title: The Usual Suspects
results.plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
results.stars: Bryan Singer, Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin

results.title: American History X
results.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
results.stars: Tony Kaye, Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien

results.title: True Romance
results.plot: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.
results.stars: Tony Scott, Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Val Kilmer

results.title: The Sandlot
results.plot: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.
results.stars: David Mickey Evans, Tom Guiry, Mike Vitar, Art LaFleur, Patrick Renna

results.title: Trainspotting
results.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
results.stars: Danny Boyle, Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner, Jonny Lee Miller, Kevin McKidd

results.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
results.plot: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.
results.stars: Guy Ritchie, Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham

results.title: Fargo
results.plot: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
results.stars: Joel Coen, Ethan Coen, William H. Macy, Frances McDormand, Steve Buscemi, Peter Stormare

results.title: Life Is Beautiful
results.plot: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.
results.stars: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano

results.title: Toy Story
results.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.
results.stars: John Lasseter, Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney

results.title: Home Alone
results.plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas eve.
results.stars: Chris Columbus, Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard

results.title: L.A. Confidential
results.plot: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
results.stars: Curtis Hanson, Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, Kim Basinger

results.title: Primal Fear
results.plot: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.
results.stars: Gregory Hoblit, Richard Gere, Laura Linney, Edward Norton, John Mahoney

results.title: The Fugitive
results.plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.
results.stars: Andrew Davis, Harrison Ford, Tommy Lee Jones, Sela Ward, Julianne Moore

results.title: A Bronx Tale
results.plot: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.
results.stars: Robert De Niro, Chazz Palminteri, Lillo Brancato, Francis Capra

results.title: Unforgiven
results.plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."
results.stars: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Richard Harris

results.title: Scent of a Woman
results.plot: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
results.stars: Martin Brest, Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, James Rebhorn, Gabrielle Anwar

results.title: The Last of the Mohicans
results.plot: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.
results.stars: Michael Mann, Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe, Russell Means, Eric Schweig

results.title: Groundhog Day
results.plot: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day, and the day keeps repeating until he gets it right.
results.stars: Harold Ramis, Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott, Stephen Tobolowsky

results.title: The Game
results.plot: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.
results.stars: David Fincher, Michael Douglas, Deborah Kara Unger, Sean Penn, James Rebhorn
